titleStmt.title: To his Highness the Lord Protector, &c. and our general. The humble petition of several colonels of the army.
titleStmt.author: Saunders, Thomas, Colonel.
Okey, John, d. 1662.
Alured, Mathew.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Thomas Saunders. John Okey. Matthevv Allured.
"Protesting against the establishement of a standing army under the command of a single person"--Thomason Catalogue.
In this edition the word "general" in line 1 of title is in full italic capital letters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
